channel.title: Keyboard Input Typing Very Slow in Whonix 15
channel.description:
Is there anything to be done with Whonix 15 workstation being very slow? By slow I mean when typing, sometimes characters are slow to appear.
I have a high end Ryzen system, and Whonix 14 was very fast. I use the latest Virtualbox.
Do I need to manually add some module or something to make it work well?

item.title: Keyboard Input Typing Very Slow in Whonix 15
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I have changed to forum thread title to Keyboard Input Typing Very Slow in Whonix 15 for lack for a better idea for a forum thread title.

Meaning, please use this thread for slow keyboard issues only. Please do not mix general (other than keyboard) Whonix slowness issues into this. Please create a new forum thread for such issues if any.

Read full topic
item.source: Keyboard Input Typing Very Slow in Whonix 15

item.title: Keyboard Input Typing Very Slow in Whonix 15
item.dc:creator: Patrick_mobile
item.description:
rob75:

By slow I mean when typing, sometimes characters are slow to appear.

This could be kloak, a security feature. See:

Whonix

Keystroke Deanonymization

deanonymization using user keystrokes, keystroke deanonymization, keystroke fingerprinting

Read full topic
item.source: Keyboard Input Typing Very Slow in Whonix 15
